Name: Father is a teacher
Description: You get the information whether the student's father works as a teacher (YES) or whether he works as something else (NO).

Name: Mother has only basic education
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother received only basic education (no education at all / primary school until 4th grade) (YES) or more than that (NO).

Name: Mother is a house wife
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother is a house wife and is not otherwise employed (YES) or whether she works something else (NO).

Name: Mother works something else
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother is a house wife or works in either teaching, health care, civil services (e.g. administrative or police) (NO) or if she works something else (YES).

Name: Parents live together
Description: You get the information whether the student's parents live together (YES) or separated (NO).

Name: Many absences
Description: You get the information whether the student has a high number of absences (more than 21) (YES) or not (NO). Reasons might be that the student is sick or simply playing truant.

Name: Student is old
Description: You get the information whether the student belongs to the older part of the class (older than 19 years) (YES) or to the younger part (NO).  The average age of the students is 17 years.

Name: Few failed classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed none or at maximum one class (YES) or a higher number of classes (NO).

Name: Failed two classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed exactly 2 classes (YES) or another number (NO).

Name: Failed 3+ classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed three / more than three classes (YES) or whether the student has failed less than three classes (NO).

Name: Small family
Description: You get the information whether the student's family size is rather small (less or equal to three) (YES) or bigger than that (NO).

Name: Average health status
Description: You get the information whether the student has an average health status (not bad, but also not exceptional) (YES) or another health status (NO).

Name: Higher education
Description: You get the information whether the student said that he/she would like to pursue higher education after finishing high school (YES) or not (NO).

Name: Extra paid classes
Description: You get the information whether the student takes extra-curricular paid classes (besides the mandatory ones) (YES) or not (NO).

Name: Studies little
Description: You get the information whether the student spends less than five hours per week studying (YES) or more than that (NO). It might be that the student is lazy or simply quickly understands the matter.
